ComicInfo.Summary:
The greatest art world discovery since Cubism! Glamourpuss presents photo-primitivist Robin Bernard - and Dave Sim's 'old-fashioned' photorealist versions of Robin's portraits. The 'History of Photorealism in Comics' section deals with the rivalry between Alex Raymond and Stan Drake which begins to heat up in 1953-54. Cover by Eisner Hall of Fame 2009 inductee, Russ Heath.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/glamourpuss-12/4000-202205/
